Admission is based on a written test conducted by the institute followed by a personal interview round. Graduates of RGUKT have an impressive placement record. During RGUKT Placements 2023, students received salary package ranging between INR 5 LPA & INR 17 LPA. 362 students received placement offers in 2023.

The institute is constantly ranked among the Top Hotel Management College in South India by Competition Success Review. IHM Shri Shakti Hyderabad offers degree and certificate programs in the discipline of Hospitality and Hotel Administration, Food Production and Patisserie. The Institute has MoU’s with leading Hotel chains and Memberships and affiliations with relevant organizations. Additionally, the institute has a Training and Placement Cell that provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The highest package offered to its students is INR 5.39 LPA. College_Summary: Woxsen School of Arts & Design is a private design school established under Woxsen University. The school is located in a campus area of 200 acres. The college has been ranked 2nd among the “All India Top Private Design Schools” as per IIRF 2023. Woxsen School of Arts & Design offers a B.Des program at the UG level in Fashion Design, Industrial Design, Interior Design and Communication Design and a Ph.D. in Fashion/ Textile. Admission to the B.Des program at Woxsen School of Arts & Design is done based on the Woxsen Design Test (WDT) followed by a Personal Interview. The admission criteria for the Ph.D. program are based on the merit in the Woxsen Research Entrance Test (WRET). In addition to this, the design school has achieved excellence in campus recruitment with a 97% placement percentage. The highest package of Woxsen School of Arts & Design is INR 12.5 LPA and the average package is offered at INR 6.6 LPA. Some of the top recruiters are Cognizant, IBM, Aditya Birla, Moshi Moshi, Rockstar Games and others.

Now, it offers 5 diploma courses in branches of Engineering. Admission to this reputed college is strictly entrance-based and admissions will be allotted on the basis of ranks secured by the students in the TS POLYCET (Telangana PolyTechnic Common Entrance Test). All the admission proceedings are taken care by the Department of Technical Education operating under the State Government of Telangana.

College_Name: Anwarul Uloom College of Business Management - [AUCBM], Hyderabad
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic, Masab Tank, Hyderabad formerly Osmania Central Technical College is a Govt institution established in the year 1923 to provide quality technical education. The Institute is located in the Mint Compound at Masab Tank Asif Nagar, Mandal, in the state of Telangana was renamed as Government Polytechnic in 1954. The institute offers diploma courses in Civil, Automobile, Mechanical, Telecommunications, Computers and Pharmacy. Apart from regular courses, the institute also has a National Cadet Corps scheme for better development of students, enriching their overall personality.

College_Name: Aadhya Degree College for Women, Hyderabad
College_Summary: GMR Aviation Academy (GMR AA), Hyderabad is the training and development arm of GMR Airports Ltd, the holding company of Airports vertical of GMR Group. The GMR Aviation Academy has been delivering training in various facets of Airport Operations. GMR AA has trained nearly 35,000 participants. GMR Aviation Academy offers a Certificate Program in the discipline of Customer Service Agent and Airport Operations.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Airline Operation

College_Name: Malla Reddy University
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic, Nizamabad, Telangana is one of the emerging institutes under education excellence. Government Polytechnic, Nizamabad is an Initiative of Govt of Telangana. The flagship course offered by Government Polytechnic, Nizamabad is Diploma in Civil Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering, Chemical Engineering and Mechanical Engineering.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic Masab Tank, Hyderabad

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}
Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB] {Hons.}

College_Name: GMR Aviation Academy - [GMRAA], Hyderabad
College_Summary: S.G. M. Government Polytechnic was established in 1980 and it was upgraded to Sanjay Gandhi Memorial Government Polytechnic in 1984. It was started with a vision of creating a sustainable environment for the youth of India to gain Technical Skill and Knowledge. The institute provides Diploma courses in 4 Streams across 1 Discipline.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic, Nizamabad
College_Summary: K.D.R Government Polytechnic College (KDRGP Wanaparthy) was established by late Sri Raja Rameshwar Rao of Wanaparthy and was inaugurated by the first Prime Minister of India Pandit Jawahar Lal Nehru on the auspicious day of Vijay Dashimi on October 11, 1959. The college began with 3 courses with a total intake of 40 seats in each course. In all these days, many students from neighbouring countries like Bangladesh and Bhutan have studied in this college to boost their skills. Currently, the college offers 6 diploma courses across varied streams and accommodates around 1,000 students in total for the three years duration course.

College_Name: NMIMS School of Law - [SOL], Hyderabad
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Koratla was founded in the year of 2008 and the college is situated near NH63 towards the Jagital Road which is very close to D40 canal. The college offers two diploma courses in the Engineering arena. The college aims to impart quality education by meeting the requirement of industry and society to achieve excellence in teaching for shaping the professionals. The college believes in reinforcing the educational performance of the students along with the extra- curricular activities to build the overall character of the students in a stronger way. There is no much scope for placements here.

College_Name: S.G. M. Government Polytechnic Abdullahpurmet, Hyderabad
College_Summary: Vivekananda College of Polytechnic at Mancherial, Telangana was established in the year 2014. It provides various Engineering and Non-Engineering Diploma courses under the approval of All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) New Delhi. This institute is located in Ganga Reddy Road, Mancherial, Adilabad approachable for students from all corners of the city to cater the needs of both Urban and Rural students by imparting technical education with decent placements. It is affiliated to the Department of Technical Education, Telangana under the Chairpersonship of Commissioner of Technical Education.

College_Name: K.D.R. Government Polytechnic Wanaparthy, Mahabubnagar
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Blamably is a Co-Ed institution, which holds approval by AICTE, New Delhi and is affiliated to Director of Technical Education, Telangana. A Total of 3 diploma courses are offered across the Engineering stream. The students of the institution are working across the entire nation in both the public and private sectors. The college is spread across 14 acres of land with well-equipped laboratories and workshops. The faculty members are very dedicated and well updated to impart high quality technical education to its students.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic Korutla, Karimnagar
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Nalgonda is a government-aided polytechnic institution of Telangana state. The institute offers diploma courses in four disciplines. The admission to this college is regulated by the DTE, Telangana and is based on the performance of students in the entrance test conducted by it. The institute has a campus of around 18.5 acres with all the required facilities for the students. The institute is one of the best polytechnic institutes of the state disseminating Technical Education to the rural youths.

College_Name: Vivekananda College of Polytechnic, Mancherial
Government Polytechnic Bellampally, Adilabad
College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Madhira (GPTM) is situated in Khammam. The institution is approved by AICTE and stands affiliated under DTE, Telangana. It offers diploma in two engineering streams. The entrance exam of TS-POLYCET is necessary for admission, which is conducted by TS State Board of Technical Education and Training. Eligibility for writing the exam to appear in the counselling is based on the marks obtained in 10th- grade examinations.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic, Nalgonda
College_Summary: S.S. Government Polytechnic (SSGPT) at Zahirabad is one of the premier technical institutions at Telangana. The institute offers diploma courses in four different disciplines.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic Cheriyal, Warangal
College_Summary: S.R.R.S. Government Polytechnic, Siricilla is a public/ government institution located in Karim Nagar, Telangana, which got founded by the Government of Telangana. S.R.R.S. Government Polytechnic College is an AICTE approved and government financed Institution. It is affiliated to DTE, Hyderabad.

College_Name: Government Polytechnic Madhira-[ GPTM], Khammam
College_Summary: In view of the increasing need of mechanization of underground mines, Singareni Collieries Polytechnic, Mancherial was established under the sponsorship of the Singareni Collieries Educational Society, Kothagudem. The college is AICTE-approved, which offers 3-year diploma courses across 5 streams of Engineering namely Civil, Computer, Electrical and Electronics, Mechanical, and Mining Engineering. The admission into the institution is allowed based on the student’s performance in the entrance. The placements support is being provided by the college as and when needed.

S.R.R.S Government Polytechnic Siricilla, Karimnagar
College_Summary: Samskruti College of Polytechnic was founded by St. Vincent Educational Society. The college offers various diploma level courses, which are approved by AICTE. It is affiliated into Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad (JNTUH). The Institute is recognized by Govt. of TS and Govt. of India. Admission into the college is decided based on the ranks/ cut-off marks in POLYCET. The College is a member of the National Entrepreneurship Network (NEN) and it supports many students in the entrepreneurship.

The institute stands out as an illustrious institute of excellence for management studies. JBS offers PGDM programs in the disciplines of Business Analytics, Entrepreneurship, Digital Marketing and Financial Market & Securities. Admission is done on the basis of merit and entrance examination.

College_Name: Q.Q.Government Polytechnic, Hyderabad
College_Summary: Kautilya School of Public Policy is located in the GITAM campus in Hyderabad. The institute offers a 2-year, full-time residential Master’s in Public Policy (MPP), a 103-credit program with a curriculum designed to expand knowledge, enhance skills, and instill values. Kautilya is designed as a non-hierarchical, interactive academic campus to enable deep learning and knowledge sharing. The classrooms, group study rooms and other academic spaces deploy the latest in IT, AV and Education technologies.

College_Summary: Skybird Aviation, established in 2005 is a private institute which is located in Hyderabad. It is a Frontline Aviation Professional Training institute in India. Since its origin as Siddhartha Group of Aviation, it has been reliably developing and is today perceived as India’s best aviation training institute. With one of a kind educational modules, teaching methods and imaginative projects we have been showing tremendous growth in Aviation, hospitality, travel administration and customer care. The institute offers BBA and BBA (Hons) courses at the undergraduate courses and offers MBA courses at the postgraduate level. The college also offers an International Diploma course in three disciplines and Certification Courses. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination.

TCCM is now regarded as the largest and most selective commerce institution in South India. TCCM provides BBA, B.Com and professional integrated courses including CLAT, IPMAT, CA, CMA, CS, as well as international courses that are recognised in over 181 countries worldwide. The BBA course costs INR 75,000 annually while the B.Com course costs INR 35,000 annually.

In addition to this, IFHE is a member of the Association of Commonwealth Universities and the Association of Indian Universities. And the institute is offering an online MBA course of a minimum of 2 years’ duration and a maximum of 4 years’ time at the Postgraduate level with a bequest of 30 years in Management education and 20 years of legacy in distance learning. This distance learning has 22 courses and is particularly designed for working professionals and people who want to make a career in Management. The college is recognized by the Central Council of Homoeopathy (New Delhi) Department of AYUSH and Government of India and is regulated and governed by esteemed MNR Educational Trust. The MNRHMCH presently offers Bachelor of Homoeopathy Medicine and Surgery (BHMS) Degree course at the Undergraduate level and Doctor of Medicine (Homoeopathy) course at the Postgraduate level to students. And admission to these courses is granted based on marks obtained by the candidate in last’s year qualifying exam and Ayush Entrance Examination. College_Summary: Forest College and Research Institute is a widely known government institute, recognized as an ICAR (Indian Council of Agricultural Research) and ICFRE (Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education) accredited government institution with NAAC grade A. The college came into existence in 2016 and offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Doctorate courses in the discipline of Forestry. FCRI is affiliated with Sri Konda Laxman Telangana State Horticultural University and is accredited with an A* Grade from the Indian Council of Agricultural Research, and the Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education. Admission to the courses of First College is granted to aspiring students depending on their combined performance in the preceding year’s qualifying exam and entrance exams like TS EAMCET (EAPCET) or ICAR-AIEEA-PG.
